title: Twitter deletes your account after 30 days. It keeps the rights on your content.

tosdr.tldr: Even if you deactive your account or if your account is closed, Twitter still has all the rights on your Content (the copyright license survives termination).  However, after 30 days Twitter begins to delete your account.
